_header: God Himself says no man may / Serve two lords unto pay
_description: Gospel for Fifteeth Sunday after Trinity, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: God him self sais no man maySerue twa lordes vnto pay…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þan heuyn blis sal be oure medeOure lord vntill þat life vs lede
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Nemo potest duobus dominis seruire.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica xv estatis Secundum Matheum (rubric, f. 119ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.110-11.
